subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey plans to speak with Rutgers officials about a report that the athletic director, Julie Hermann, quit her former job after players complained of abuse.
snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey plans to speak with Rutgers officials about a report that the athletic director, Julie Hermann, quit her former job after players complained of abuse.
